Description:
Detects PowerShell scripts attempting to disable scheduled scanning and other parts of Windows Defender ATP or set default actions to allow.

Author: frack113, elhoim, Tim Shelton (fps, alias support), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Tamper Windows Defender - ScriptBlockLogging
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((scriptblocktext like '%set-mppreference%' and (scriptblocktext like '%-dbaf $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dbaf 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dbm $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dbm 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dips $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dips 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablearchivescanning $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablearchivescanning 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablebehaviormonitoring $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablebehaviormonitoring 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableblockatfirstseen $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableblockatfirstseen 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablecatchupfullscan $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablecatchupfullscan 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablecatchupquickscan $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablecatchupquickscan 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableintrusionpreventionsystem $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableintrusionpreventionsystem 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableioavprotection $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableioavprotection 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablerealtimemonitoring $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablerealtimemonitoring 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableremovabledrivescanning $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disableremovabledrivescanning 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablescanningmappednetworkdrivesforfullscan $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablescanningmappednetworkdrivesforfullscan 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablescanningnetworkfiles $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablescanningnetworkfiles 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablescriptscanning $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-disablescriptscanning 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-mapsreporting $false%' or scriptblocktext like '%-mapsreporting 0%' or scriptblocktext like '%-drdsc $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-drdsc 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-drtm $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-drtm 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dscrptsc $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dscrptsc 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dsmndf $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dsmndf 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dsnf $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dsnf 1%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dss $true%' or scriptblocktext like '%-dss 1%')) or (scriptblocktext like '%set-mppreference%' and (scriptblocktext like '%highthreatdefaultaction allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%htdefac allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%lowthreatdefaultaction allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%ltdefac allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%moderatethreatdefaultaction allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%mtdefac allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%severethreatdefaultaction allow%' or scriptblocktext like '%stdefac allow%')))
